articles.author: Ashish Dangwal
articles.title: Zorawar Tank: Snubbed By Germany, India Unveils ‘US Powered’ Light Battle Tank To Challenge China At LAC - EurAsian Times
articles.description: Zorawar Tank: India's DRDO & Larsen and Toubro (L&T) have unveiled indigenous light tank, 'Zorawar,' on July 6. It is powered by US engine
articles.content: Zorawar Tank: In a significant advancement for the Indian armed forces stationed along the border with China in Ladakh, the Defence Research and Development Organisation (DRDO) and private sector fir… [+6023 chars]
